name: Dark Void (Prototype)
description:
Descend into the depths of a dark maze to find your missing wife.

Dark Void is a short game with roguelite and survival-horror elements that takes place in a multi-level rotating maze. 

As you navigate the depths, you will find pickups left by your wife that will help you get further on your journey, and encounter mysterious enemies that will do everything they can to stop you. Your carbide lamp will light the way, as long as you have fuel.

This game is a prototype of a project currently in development. 

Controls

Move  -  WASD

Use Item  -  Q

Continue  -  Space

Pause  -  Esc

Credits Game Designers 

Manuel Bissonnette & Inez Gill

Modeler

Tom Alderton

Programmer
